Login Code Timeout

No login code received from Tailscale.

This can be caused by Android TV bugs. Please try:

1. Restart your TV completely
2. Open the app again
3. Try VPN setup again
VPN Timeout

Tailscale login was successful, but VPN could not connect.

This can be caused by Android TV bugs. Please try:

1. Restart your TV completely
2. Open the app again
3. Try VPN setup again

If the problem persists, check your Tailscale Dashboard.
Login Timeout

Login could not be completed.

This can be caused by Android TV bugs. Please try:

1. Restart your TV completely
2. Open the app again
3. Try VPN setup again

Also check if the device was authorized in the Tailscale Dashboard.
